tool_description: Calculates performance baselines from historical container metrics data using statistical analysis and machine learning techniques for anomaly detection reference.

historical_data.description: Historical metric values for baseline calculation

baseline_method.description: Baseline calculation method: statistical, seasonal, trend_adjusted, ml_based

seasonality_period.description: Seasonality period in hours for seasonal method (1-168)

outlier_threshold.description: Outlier removal threshold as standard deviations (1-5)

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need at least 100 data points for reliable baseline calculation.
Invalid baseline method: Use one of [statistical, seasonal, trend_adjusted, ml_based].
Invalid time window: Must be between 1-365 days.
Invalid seasonality period: Must be between 1-168 hours when using seasonal method.
Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.8-0.99.
Invalid outlier threshold: Must be between 1-5 standard deviations.
Baseline calculation failed: Unable to calculate baseline due to data quality issues.
usage: Provide historical_data and baseline_method, optionally configure time_window_days, seasonality settings, and statistical parameters for baseline calculation.

baseline_value.description: Calculated baseline value for the metric

baseline_quality.description: Quality assessment of baseline: excellent, good, fair, poor

data_points_used.description: Number of data points used in baseline calculation
